name: Hero's Memorial
uniques: Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
quote:
Wolvenvale honors those who gave their lives. As Lucien Suave once gave his for the sake of his people, we ardently choose to protect all that he sacrificed for.
-Leovold, Academy Headmaster

name: Adventurer's Academy
uniques: New [Military] units start with [15] Experience [in this city]
